episode.summary: We don’t know where Lin Regiostar resides who is the ghost of the Catholic priest. Since his first appearance, nothing has really happened with him. It`s finally time for him to rest in peace. However, the reason he wants to rest in peace is to remain in this world to clear up his strong regret. That regret is not making out with a maid. Is he drawing closer to the hand of the devil? Can Hayate protect Maria? Isumi is dressed as a maid and Maria, Saki are already maids. When the third maid appears, all sorts of conversations begin. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 僕たちの行方
Our Direction
Boku-tachi no Yukue
episode.summary: April 3rd is Sakuya’s birthday. One of the gals is a bit worried regarding this day of celebration. Her name is Chiharu Harukaze. She is the secretary of Hakuo Academy and the manager of the Maid Café “Himawari”. Izumi and her friends invite her to go to karaoke which she turns down because she said she doesn’t like noisy places. Actually, the real reason is that she works at a maid café where she is always welcoming the customers energetically even though that is not her true personality. She heard that Hayate and Nagi will be at Sakuya’s party which worries her. Will she be able to protect her secret of being a maid? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Keep On Dreaming
Keep On Dreaming
Keep On Dreaming
episode.summary: Is she the typical wealthy, capricious type? For Hayate’s birthday, Nagi declares to get a part time job to save up money to buy him a watch. All those present were surprised to hear this but Hinagiku currently works part-time at the coffee shop, “Donguri". The manager of “Donguri” calls Hayate and mentions that they are currently looking for someone to take Hinagiku’s place. Hayate already has a job as a butler so he’s a bit hesitant but Maria, thinking on her toes, encourages this so he can work at “Donguri” with Nagi. Nishizawa-san also works there. This is Nagi’s first part-time job, how will she handle it? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: なんだかんだで自分ちの猫が一番かわいい
Somehow Our Own Cat is the Very Cutest
Nandakanda de Jibin`chi no Neko ga Ichiban Kawaii
episode.summary: There was breaking news that a four meter anaconda that was being raised by someone got loose and ran away which created a lot of commotion. Nagi and Maria couldn’t believe that someone would have such a big and dangerous animal as a pet. The Sanzenins also have a pet that could be categorized as “big and dangerous”; Tama, the white tiger who always hungers for ALL of Nagi’s affection to himself. He wanted to get rid of one of his competition, Shiranui, the pet cat so he began to chase her down. At that moment, there was a delivery truck at their house and Tama chases Shiranui into the truck when the door shut! They are about to go to an unknown place. Tama’s survival instincts begin… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Distance
Distance
Distance
episode.summary: Hinagiku and Nishizawa-san unexpectedly meet at the coffee shop “Donguri”. Hinagiku wants to talk to Nishizawa-san about Hayate so she invites her to enjoy the cherry blossoms with her one evening. But, Nishizawa-san invites her to go on the ferris wheel which is a symbol of Ginnan district. But, if you guys remember, Hinagiku is afraid of heights. Will she be about to express her thoughts in this situation? Sakuya’s birthday party is also happening at this time at Aizawa’s house. Nagi was so exhausted she lies down on her bed but no one is aware of her whereabouts so they get worried. Is she okay? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: お嬢様と執事のお話ですから
Because it`s a Story About a Rich Girl and Her Butler
Ojousama to Shitsuji no Ohanashi desu kara
episode.summary: After working at a part-time job for the first time and attending Sakuya’s birthday party, Nagi’s health took a slight toll so she’s resting in bed. Maria, Claus, Tama, & Shiranui are all out which leaves Hayate and Nagi alone in Nagi’s estate. The second half is also climactic. The original development returns; the development of the forbidden love…will it happen? Source: crunchyroll
